casebody.data:
John James Jackson et al., Libelants-Appellants, v. Steamship ARCHIMEDES, Lamport & Holt Line, Limited, Claimant-Respondent. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 3, 1926.) No. 366. Silas B. Axtell, of New York City (John W. Davis and James M. Nieely, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellants. Burlingham, Veeder, Hasten & Fearey, of New York City (Van Veehten 'Veeder and William J. Dean, both of New York City, of counsel), for respondent. Frederic R. Coudert and Howard Thayer Kingsbury, both of New York City, for British Embassy, amici curias.

Before ROGERS, HOUGH, and MACK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree (10 F. [2d] 234) affirmed, on the opinion of Judge Augustus N. Hand in the court below.
